question: During the reign of Vijay sena which poet lived in his court?
explanation: During the reign of Vijay sena, Shri Harsha lived in his court. His works \"Gaudorviskulprashasti (eulogy of the royal family of Gauda) and the Vijayprashasti (eulogy of Vijay)\" were inspired by the reign of King Vijay Sena of Sena dynasty.
